Started in the year 2014, Instep School Of Dance and Music in Goregaon East, Mumbai is amongst the revered academies for dance. A team of instructors trains a plethora of students in a variety of dance forms. This school is also instrumental in organising a host of events followed by fests that feature stage shows. We are dedicated to enriching students lives through quality dance training. We encourage all our students to express themselves through dance and music. Our aim is to provide each student with self-esteem, confidence and grace to successfully achieve their goals in and outside of the classroom.
Shop No.S/8, Mhada Shopping Complex, NMP Circle 1/2, Goregaon East, Mumbai - 400065, India.
We just need your registered email id to send you password reset link

Preeti Ray is a Bharatnatyam visharad. She started to learn dance at the age of 5 and used to participate in school drama and musicals. She started her own dance lessons for school kids and was an instant hit with the students. Later when she moved to Mumbai, she continued learning new dance forms like Zumba, Aerobics and included those in her dance studio she formed in 2014. She is very popular among all her students with her ever smiling face and willingness to help each student to learn this art to the core.

Subroto Ray comes from Sales management background and has worked with fortune 500 companies before joining his wife Preeti fulltime to run this dance studio. He has applied sales and management experience to help this dance studio reach to larger audience and actively manages day to day activities in studio.
Susmita holds diploma in Kathak and won Gold Medal at 16. She won various awards for best Choreography and has Choreographed at IIFA 2014.
We are on Facebook. Click here to Visit us today to see latest photos and videos from our awesome students and don\'t forget to Like us to stay updated with our latest events.
Riya Sharma is a graduate in English Honors and is passionate about writing. She enjoys writing and is very keen to pass on the knowledge to ISDM students.
Ashish Lohar is passionate about music and is trained in Tabla, Guitar and Keyboard instruments. He enjoys teaching to his students.
Banita Basu has been teaching Drawing since last 15 years and trains students for grade exams like Elementary and Intermediate.

Sameer Gharge is teaching advanced Yoga since last 3 years and has been enjoying working with students.
